name: Lowyat Forum High Contrast
description:
Same as LYN dark version, but with most text are white (aka #FFF)
Now, it's AMOLED friendly, meaning the all black background will save more power for your smartphone with AMOLED screen.
additional_info:
rev.03 added lo-fi version fix
rev.04 blended lowyat news RSS into theme
rev.05 WOFF from Google, buttons coloration
